XenotypeDef.label: Demon
XenotypeDef.description: Demons are powerful, malevolent beings transformed by Muzan Kibutsuji's blood, possessing superhuman abilities, regenerative powers, and a hunger for human flesh.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Demons are powerful, malevolent beings transformed by Muzan Kibutsuji's blood, possessing superhuman abilities, regenerative powers, and a hunger for human flesh.
